channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SYNAPSE-857] Templates Sample is broken
item.description:
Getting following exception while running Sample-750.This happens because of improper paths to resources in synapse samples.

2012-03-17 23:20:20,113 [-] [main] WARN SynapseConfigUtils IO Error reading from URL /home/../synapse-2.1.0/repository/samples/resources/transform/transform.xsltjava.io.FileNotFoundException: /home/../synapse-2.1.0/repository/samples/resources/transform/transform.xslt (No such file or directory)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Attached a patch by properly defining path to the resources.Please review & commit.

Thanks,
Malith

Malith , appreciate your contribution.
This patch is committed under rev. 1505085
issue is fixed and i see no further complications here , hence closing
